articles.description: A new Netflix documentary portrays the manhunt of a serial killer who terrorised California in the 1980s - but it was his poor dental hygiene which helped police eventually catch him.

articles.title: Siegfried Fischbacher of Las Vegas duo Siegfried and Roy dies of pancreatic cancer at 81 - USA TODAY
articles.description: Siegfried Fischbacher, who partnered with Roy Horn for the Las Vegas stage act Siegfried and Roy, died Wednesday at age 81 of pancreatic cancer.
articles.content:
Siegfried Fischbacher, of Siegfried and Roy, has died at 81 years old after battling pancreatic cancer.

articles.author: Scottie Andrew, CNN
articles.title: A Dolly Parton statue may be erected at the Tennessee Capitol - CNN
articles.description: A state representative proposed erecting a Dolly Parton statue that will sit on the Tennessee Capitol grounds "to recognize her for all she has contributed to this state." If it's commissioned, the Parton sculpture will face the historic Ryman Auditorium.
